<#600101>Reset:</color> Restore a card to its default state (as it would appear in the Deck Builder).

<#600101>Retaliation:</color> Trigger this ability whenever this Unit is Damaged but not sent to the Graveyard.

<#600101>Revealed:</color> A card in the hand that has been turned over.

<#600101>Round End:</color> Trigger this ability when the Round ends.

<#600101>Stubborn:</color> Cannot be replayed or returned to the hand.
<#600101>Summon:</color> Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
<#600101>Swap:</color> Move a card from hand to deck and draw another in its place during your turn.

<#600101>Transform:</color> Convert into a different card.
<#600101>Trio:</color> Exactly 3 Unlocked copies of a Unit on a row.
<#600101>Truce:</color> If neither player has passed.

<#600101>Turn Start:</color> Trigger this ability at the start of your turn.
